xwikidoc.name: CleanLogout
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.adminPolx
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.adminPolx
xwikidoc.content: #* @vtlvariable name="doc" type="com.xpn.xwiki.api.Document" *# ## @vtlvariable name="asset" type="org.curriki.xwiki.plugin.asset.Asset" ## @vtlvariable name="document" type="com.xpn.xwiki.api.Document" #* @vtlvariable name="xwiki" type="com.xpn.xwiki.api.XWiki" *# ## #* @vtlvariable name="util" type="com.xpn.xwiki.api.Util" *# ## #* @vtlvariable name="request" type="javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest" *# ## #* @vtlvariable name="context" type="com.xpn.xwiki.api.Context" *# ## #* @vtlvariable name="msg" type="com.xpn.xwiki.web.XWikiMessageTool" *# ## #* @vtlvariable name="escapetool" type="org.apache.velocity.tools.generic.EscapeTool" *# ## #if($targets)#else#set($targets=$xwiki.parseGroovyFromPage("Registration.TargetsGroovy"))## #set($junk=$targets.init($request,$xwiki))## #end## #if($targets=="groovy_missingrights")#warn("warning, missing rights, expect malfunction.")#end## #set($success=$targets.cleanLogout($request,$response))## #if($success)#else$response.sendRedirect("/xwiki/bin/logout/XWiki/XWikiLogout?xredirect=$escapetool.url($request.getParameter($xredirect))")#end
